snippet: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel beat out Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o and Kansas State quarterback Collin Klein for college football’s most prestigious award.
abstract: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel becomes the first freshman to win the Heisman Trophy; Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o finishes a distant second and Kansas State quarterback Collin Klein is third in voting; result, awarding Manziel the Heisman over two seniors who played with understated mastery, is expected, yet progressive for talented freshmen to come.
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel beat out Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o and Kansas State quarterback Collin Klein for college football’s most prestigious award.

headline.seo: Texas A&M Freshman Quarterback Johnny Manziel Wins Heisman Trophy
headline.main: Manziel, in His First Season, Achieves a Heisman First
headline.print_headline: Manziel, in His First Season, Achieves a Heisman First
